jalse.entities

Class DefaultEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • jalse.misc.AbstractIdentifiable
      • jalse.entities.DefaultEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionScheduler<Entity>, AttributeContainer, Entity, EntityContainer, Identifiable, Taggable

    public class DefaultEntity
extends AbstractIdentifiable
implements Entity
    A simple yet fully featured Entity implementation.

    This entity can be marked as alive (markAsAlive()) or dead (markAsDead()).
    See Also:
    DefaultEntityFactory, DefaultEntityContainer, DefaultAttributeContainer, DefaultActionScheduler, TagTypeSet

      • unmarkAsType

        public boolean unmarkAsType(java.lang.Class<? extends Entity> type)
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Removes the specified type from the entity. If this type is the ancestor of any other types associated to the entity they will be removed.
        Specified by:
        unmarkAsType in interface Entity
        Parameters:
        type - Entity type to remove.
        Returns:
        Whether the entity was previously associated to the type (or its any of its children).
